## PR4095 Water Column Structure Tender

***

**Reference Number:**
WS3634635727-Doc3663106372

**Solicitation Number:**
WS3634635727

**Publication Date:**
November 14, 2022

**Tender Closing Date:**
December 12, 2022 2:00 PM EST [Expired]

***

### Summary of the Tender

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) for the acquisition of a Water Column structure, including fabrication and delivery, to replace the existing one at the Institut Maurice-Lamontagne located in Mont-Joli, Quebec, Canada.

### Key Details

* **Scope of Work:** The Water Column structure will be fabricated and delivered to the Institut Maurice-Lamontagne, according to the specifications detailed in Section 7.
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive, Open Bidding [Expired]
* **Sourcing Requirements:** None

### Bid Submission Information

All required documentation and bid submissions must be received by the tender closing date and time. Late bids will not be accepted.

### Relevant Contact Information

* **Project Manager, Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)**:
	+ Name: Philippe Montpetit, SPAC/PSPC
	+ Email: [philippe.montpetit@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:philippe.montpetit@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Other Relevant Details

* **Trade Agreements:** The following trade agreements apply to this tender: 
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery:** 
	+ Mont-Joli, Quebec, Canada

### Contact Information for Additional Information

You may visit the following website for additional information and supporting documentation:
 [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14631139?extsite=MTQ2MzExMzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14631139?extsite=MTQ2MzExMzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
